summary.span: 表示可在运行时动态添加和删除其成员的对象。

span.span: Represents an object whose members can be dynamically added and removed at run time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ExpandoObject`类使你能够在运行时添加和删除其实例的成员，还可以设置和获取这些成员的值。The `ExpandoObject` class enables you to add and delete members of its instances at run time and also to set and get values of these members. 此类支持动态绑定，使你可以使用类似的标准语法， `sampleObject.sampleMember` 而不是更复杂的语法 `sampleObject.GetAttribute("sampleMember")` 。This class supports dynamic binding, which enables you to use standard syntax like `sampleObject.sampleMember` instead of more complex syntax like `sampleObject.GetAttribute("sampleMember")`. `ExpandoObject`类实现 (DLR) 接口的标准动态语言运行时 ，这使你能够在 `ExpandoObject` 支持 DLR 互操作性模型的语言之间共享类的实例。The `ExpandoObject` class implements the standard Dynamic Language Runtime (DLR) interface , which enables you to share instances of the `ExpandoObject` class between languages that support the DLR interoperability model. 例如，可以使用 c # 创建类的实例 `ExpandoObject` ，然后将其传递给 IronPython 函数。For example, you can create an instance of the `ExpandoObject` class in C# and then pass it to an IronPython function. 有关详细信息，请参阅 c # 常见问题网站上的 [动态语言运行时概述](/dotnet/framework/reflection-and-codedom/dynamic-language-runtime-overview) 和 [介绍 ExpandoObject](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=169157) 。For more information, see [Dynamic Language Runtime Overview](/dotnet/framework/reflection-and-codedom/dynamic-language-runtime-overview) and [Introducing the ExpandoObject](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=169157) on the C# Frequently Asked Questions Web site. `ExpandoObject`类是动态对象概念的实现，它允许获取、设置和调用成员。The `ExpandoObject` class is an implementation of the dynamic object concept that enables getting, setting, and invoking members. 如果要定义具有其自己的动态调度语义的类型，请使用 类。If you want to define types that have their own dynamic dispatch semantics, use the class. 如果希望定义动态对象如何参与互操作性协议并管理 DLR 快速动态调度缓存，请创建自己的 接口实现。If you want to define how dynamic objects participate in the interoperability protocol and manage DLR fast dynamic dispatch caching, create your own implementation of the interface. ## 创建实例Creating an Instance 在 c # 中，若要为类的实例启用后期绑定 `ExpandoObject` ，必须使用 `dynamic` 关键字。In C#, to enable late binding for an instance of the `ExpandoObject` class, you must use the `dynamic` keyword. 有关更多信息，请参见[使用类型 dynamic](/dotnet/csharp/programming-guide/types/using-type-dynamic)。For more information, see [Using Type dynamic](/dotnet/csharp/programming-guide/types/using-type-dynamic). 在 Visual Basic 中，后期绑定支持动态操作。In Visual Basic, dynamic operations are supported by late binding. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Visual Basic) 的早期和后期绑定 (](/dotnet/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/early-late-binding/)。For more information, see [Early and Late Binding (Visual Basic)](/dotnet/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/early-late-binding/). 下面的代码示例演示如何创建类的实例 `ExpandoObject` 。The following code example demonstrates how to create an instance of the `ExpandoObject` class. [!code-csharp[System.Dynamic.ExpandoObject#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.dynamic.expandoobject/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Dynamic.ExpandoObject#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.dynamic.expandoobject/vb/module1.vb#1)] ## 添加新成员Adding New Members 可以向类的实例添加属性、方法和事件 `ExpandoObject` 。You can add properties, methods, and events to instances of the `ExpandoObject` class. 下面的代码示例演示如何将新属性添加到类的实例 `ExpandoObject` 。The following code example demonstrates how to add a new property to an instance of the `ExpandoObject` class. [!code-csharp[System.Dynamic.ExpandoObject#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.dynamic.expandoobject/cs/program.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Dynamic.ExpandoObject#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.dynamic.expandoobject/vb/module1.vb#2)] 方法表示存储为委托的 lambda 表达式，这些表达式可在需要时调用。The methods represent lambda expressions that are stored as delegates, which can be invoked when they are needed. 下面的代码示例演示如何添加递增动态属性值的方法。The following code example demonstrates how to add a method that increments a value of the dynamic property. [!code-csharp[System.Dynamic.ExpandoObject#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.dynamic.expandoobject/cs/program.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Dynamic.ExpandoObject#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.dynamic.expandoobject/vb/module1.vb#3)] 下面的代码示例演示如何将事件添加到类的实例 `ExpandoObject` 。The following code example demonstrates how to add an event to an instance of the `ExpandoObject` class. ```csharp class Program { static void Main(string[] args) { dynamic sampleObject = new ExpandoObject(); // Create a new event and initialize it with null. sampleObject.sampleEvent = null; // Add an event handler. sampleObject.sampleEvent += new EventHandler(SampleHandler); // Raise an event for testing purposes. sampleObject.sampleEvent(sampleObject, new EventArgs()); } // Event handler. static void SampleHandler(object sender, EventArgs e) { Console.WriteLine("SampleHandler for {0} event", sender); } } // This code example produces the following output: // SampleHandler for System.Dynamic.ExpandoObject event. ``` ```vb Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim sampleObject As Object = New ExpandoObject() ' Create a new event and initialize it with null. sampleObject.sampleEvent = Nothing ' Add an event handler. Dim handler As EventHandler = AddressOf SampleHandler sampleObject.sampleEvent = [Delegate].Combine(sampleObject.sampleEvent, handler) ' Raise an event for testing purposes. sampleObject.sampleEvent.Invoke(sampleObject, New EventArgs()) End Sub ' Event handler. Sub SampleHandler(ByVal sender As Object, ByVal e As EventArgs) Console.WriteLine("SampleHandler for {0} event", sender) End Sub ' This code example produces the following output: ' SampleHandler for System.Dynamic.ExpandoObject event. End Module ``` ## 作为参数传递Passing As a Parameter 可以将类的实例 `ExpandoObject` 作为参数传递。You can pass instances of the `ExpandoObject` class as parameters. 请注意，在 Visual Basic 中，这些实例被视为 c # 中的动态对象和后期绑定的对象。Note that these instances are treated as dynamic objects in C# and late-bound objects in Visual Basic. 这意味着你没有对象成员的 IntelliSense，因此，当你调用不存在的成员时，不会收到编译器错误。This means that you do not have IntelliSense for object members and you do not receive compiler errors when you call non-existent members. 如果调用的成员不存在，则会出现异常。If you call a member that does not exist, an exception occurs. 下面的代码示例演示如何创建和使用方法来打印属性的名称和值。The following code example demonstrates how you can create and use a method to print the names and values of properties. [!code-csharp[System.Dynamic.ExpandoObject#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.dynamic.expandoobject/cs/program.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Dynamic.ExpandoObject#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.dynamic.expandoobject/vb/module1.vb#4)] ## 枚举和删除成员Enumerating and Deleting Members `ExpandoObject` 类实现 `IDictionary` 接口。The `ExpandoObject` class implements the `IDictionary` interface. 这样就可以在运行时枚举添加到类的实例的成员 `ExpandoObject` 。This enables enumeration of members added to the instance of the `ExpandoObject` class at run time. 如果在编译时不知道实例可能具有哪些成员，则这会很有用。This can be useful if you do not know at compile time what members an instance might have. 下面的代码示例演示如何将类的实例转换 `ExpandoObject` 为 接口并枚举实例的成员。The following code example shows how you can cast an instance of the `ExpandoObject` class to the interface and enumerate the instance's members. [!code-csharp[System.Dynamic.ExpandoObject#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.dynamic.expandoobject/cs/program.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Dynamic.ExpandoObject#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.dynamic.expandoobject/vb/module1.vb#5)] 在不具有删除成员 (如 c # 和 Visual Basic) 的语法的语言中，可以通过将的实例隐式强制转换 `ExpandoObject` 为 `IDictionary` 接口，然后将该成员作为键/值对删除，来删除成员。In languages that do not have syntax for deleting members (such as C# and Visual Basic), you can delete a member by implicitly casting an instance of the `ExpandoObject` to the `IDictionary` interface and then deleting the member as a key/value pair. 下面的示例说明了这一点。This is shown in the following example. [!code-csharp[System.Dynamic.ExpandoObject#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.dynamic.expandoobject/cs/program.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Dynamic.ExpandoObject#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.dynamic.expandoobject/vb/module1.vb#6)] ## 接收属性更改的通知Receiving Notifications of Property Changes `ExpandoObject`类实现 接口，并可 在添加、删除或修改成员后引发事件。The `ExpandoObject` class implements the interface and can raise a event when a member is added, deleted, or modified. 这使 `ExpandoObject` 类与 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 数据绑定和其他需要通知对象内容更改的环境。This enables `ExpandoObject` class integration with Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) data binding and other environments that require notification about changes in the object content. 下面的代码示例演示如何为事件创建事件处理程序 `PropertyChanged` 。The following code example demonstrates how to create an event handler for the `PropertyChanged` event. [!code-csharp[System.Dynamic.ExpandoObject#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.dynamic.expandoobject/cs/program.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Dynamic.ExpandoObject#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.dynamic.expandoobject/vb/module1.vb#7)]
